name: Cheems Smnake
description:
It's just the snake game with anxiety :p
  • No game engine, It's made with python 3.9 and the Turtle module 
  • Sprites made with Aseprite
  • Sounds effects are from freesound.org

Donations are appreciated UwU

Sound effects source
  • Pickup Food -> Sound source 
  • Wall Hit  -> Sound source
  • Bonk -> Sound Source
Source code in GitHub!

< https://github.com/Kazymila/Cheems-Smnake>

 I just made it for practice and fun lol
